0.0.2.en: 0.0.2 "getting better at IO": Major runtime update with config normalization via MsgConfig, expanded plugin runtime (autodiscovery + multi-instance), completed IngestStates custom-rule engine, archive IO refactor with native/ioBroker backends plus strategy resolver, new Admin Tab panels and controls, new integrations (Alexa Shopping/Tasks, Telegram, DWD, Pushover, Shopping PDF), and extended docs/i18n tooling.
